intro: Hoya tengchongensis, commonly known as the Tengchong hoya, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its thick, fleshy stems and clusters of waxy, star-shaped flowers. The plant produces small, fragrant blossoms that are typically white or pale pink in color. It is a popular choice for indoor gardening due to its ornamental value and relatively low maintenance requirements. Hoya tengchongensis thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil.
